## Attributes/Options

List the attributes or options the extension supports that would benefit from autocomplete:

| Attribute | Type | Valid Values | Description |
|-----------|------|--------------|-------------|
| `attr-1` | enum | `a`, `b`, `c` | What it does |
| `attr-2` | boolean | `true`, `false` | What it does |
| `attr-3` | number | any | What it does |

## Example Usage

```markdown
[text]{.extension-class attr-1=value attr-2=true}
```
